frontmatter.title: JS Checkbox
frontmatter.desc: This is the tenth project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. We'll be building a gmail style "hold shift and check all" items type list. You can check any element in the list, then hold shift and check another element, and all the elements in between should also get checked.

frontmatter.title: CSS and JS clock
frontmatter.desc: This is the second project of Wes Bos's JS30 series. We will be building a "clock" as using 'div's, some CSS animation and javascript. The idea is to replicate a minimalistic analog wall clock with an hours, minutes and seconds hand.
